means: 福音传道，福音主义，福音传道者的工作

sentence.Network_en: For some, family breakdown presents an opportunity for evangelism.
sentence.Network_cn: 对一些人来说, 家庭的衰落给福音主义一个机会.

sentence.Network_en: How could we purge our evangelism of its excessive and damaging subjectivity?
sentence.Network_cn: 那么,我们该怎样清理现时福音信息里过多及有害的主观成分?

sentence.Network_en: Did Jesus fail that day in his evangelism? Jesus doesn't fail.
sentence.Network_cn: 耶稣那天传福音失败了 吗 ?耶稣不失败的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 热心传福音(Evangelism)：现在开始到年底，列出一些关心的名单，并好好为他们代祷，目标要传福音给他们。(太二十八：18-20)： …

...义」作为整个记号，在德国的信义宗的教会因而被称为「福音的教会」(Evangelical Churches)。

entry.tran: （尤指向非基督教徒的）传布福音，福音传教
entry.def: Evangelism is the teaching of Christianity, especially to people who are not Christians.

means.word_mean: 1. zealous preaching and advocacy of the gospel
